title: HotWok
description: restaurante in Bergen with great food at the right price.

title: Elias mat & sånt
description: Elias mat & sånt serve good lunch, tasty dinners and delicious desserts at the right price. Their menu is inspired by Norwegian nature, and that theme is conveied through the site layout as well.

title: Nordic IT Project
description: A simple and elegant single-page website, presenting the company and their services, including a small section where the owners can add short updates.

title: Askeladden Steinerbarnehage
description: The Kindergarten in Hurum wanted a new website for parents and anyone interested in learning more about this unique approach to childcare. The website includes a private section for parents where images can be uploaded with less privacy concerns.

title: Askerbøringen
description: A periódico designed for the local elections in Norway and printed in aproximately 60.000 copies.

title: Asker Venstres kommunevalgprogram
description: Printed program for Asker Venstre's political campaign during the 2019 local elections.
